nodes.text: The electro sword was a type of electrified short sword used by the Kage Warriors of the planet Quarzite. Electro swords were used as melee weapons but were also often used as throwing blades, as Krismo Sodi used one in such a fashion to kill the Belugan Major Rigosso.
Despite being an energized weapon, electro-swords are no match for a lightsaber, which can easily cut it in half.
